definition: water and soil/surface water/natural environment (extended meaning)/climate
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
(of a stranger) not accustomed to the climate of a new place/not acclimatized
Seaboard Geographic Gazetteer (c. 275) by Shen Ying 沈瑩|沈莹

sentences.english: Now the "angry river" is under a dual-threat from both soil erosion and a new dam project.
sentences.chinese: 怒江正面临着水土流失和新建大坝的双重威胁。

sentences.english: The cumulative amount of controlled soil and water loss area in Pingchang county, Sichuan province is 782.
sentences.chinese: 四川省平昌县已累计治理水土流失面积782。

sentences.english: Water and soil loss is an important landforms evolution course.
sentences.chinese: 水土流失其实是一种主要的侵蚀地貌演化过程。

sentences.english: By analyzing, this paper expounds its concrete application in Soil and Water Conservaˉtion research.
sentences.chinese: 通过分析，引入它在水土保持研究中的具体应用。

sentences.english: Economical woodlands have a positive effect on soil conservation in red soil.
sentences.chinese: 经济林地和草地则起到了很好的水土保持措施作用。

sentences.english: Trees play an important part in water and soil conservation.
sentences.chinese: 树木在水土保持发挥的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Further strengthening soil-water conservation in upstream area of the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 要进一步加强上游地区的水土保持工作。

sentences.english: Soil cannot regenerate, so please prevent soil pollution and desertification, and reduce soil erosion.
sentences.chinese: 土壤不能再生，防止土壤污染和沙化，减少水土流失。

sentences.english: These are ideal conditions for diseases of filth to flourish.
sentences.chinese: 这些是水土污染引起的疾病盛行的理想条件。
他们从未在埃及服水土。

sentences.english: The country not agreeing with her, she returned to England.
sentences.chinese: 她杂阿谁国度不服水土，所以回到了英国。

sentences.english: Soil and water were raising one side.
The synthetical benefits of soil and water conservation after harness in …
sentences.chinese: 综合评价了石马河小流域治理后的水土保持效益。

sentences.english: Come on, it's because I just arrived and haven't acclimated yet.
sentences.chinese: 哪儿能啊，我只是刚来有点儿水土不服罢了。

sentences.english: Shaanbei Luochuan loess plateau is one of soil erosion districts which is mainly resulted from loess slump.
sentences.chinese: 陕北洛川黄土塬是水土流失严重的地区。

sentences.english: We know how water scarcity translates into diseases of filth.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道缺水怎样转变成由水土污染引起的疾病。

definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
natural conditions and social customs of a place/local conditions
five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood 木, fire 火, earth 土, metal 金, water 水
illustrious hero, spirit of the place (idiom); a place derives reflected glory from an illustrious son
Jinshui District of Zhengzhou City 鄭州市|郑州市[Zheng4 zhou1 Shi4], Henan
